text: May Nurgle's blessings rain upon you.
Rejoice in the embrace of decay.
May the sweet rot of Nurgle be with you.
In filth and pestilence, find solace.
Bask in the loving decay of Nurgle.
May your plagues be plentiful.
Embrace the glorious cycle of life and death.
In pestilence, find renewal.
Let the plague blooms of Nurgle surround you.
Rejoice in the putrid mire of Nurgle.
May the pus of Nurgle's blessings fill your life.
In the garden of decay, find joy.
Revel in the filth and rot.
Nurgle's love is the truest embrace.
May the gifts of Nurgle be ever present.
Let the plague-father's touch guide you.
May you find strength in the suffering.
Rejoice in the blessings of Nurgle.
In pestilence, we are made whole.
May the sweet nectar of decay be yours.
Embrace the cycle of life and death.
In the throes of plague, find rebirth.
May you find refuge in Nurgle's embrace.
Revel in the putrid blessings of Nurgle.
Let the contagion of Nurgle's love spread.
May your suffering be a joyful offering.
In decay, find enlightenment.
May the garden of Nurgle bloom for you.
Rejoice in the filth and disease.
Nurgle's gifts are the ultimate joy.
May the sweet decay of Nurgle be your salvation.
In our rot, we find purpose.
Let the plague-ridden soil nourish you.
May the cycle of life and death guide your path.
In the pestilence, find strength.
Revel in the blessings of the Plague Father.
Let the sickness of Nurgle be your delight.
May the embrace of decay warm your heart.
In the grip of plague, find renewal.
May the joy of Nurgle be with you always.
Rejoice in the bountiful gifts of Nurgle.
Let the filth of Nurgle's garden envelop you.
May the putrid mire be your sanctuary.
In the decay, find the meaning of life.
Nurgle's blessings are the ultimate treasure.
May your suffering be a testament to your devotion.
Rejoice in the decay and filth.
Let the plague blooms of Nurgle bring you joy.
May the pus of Nurgle's embrace fill your soul.
In the garden of rot, find beauty.
Nurgle's gifts are the cure for all ills.
May your suffering be a joyful reunion.
Revel in the embrace of decay.
Let the sweet rot of Nurgle be your refuge.
May your plagues be a testament to your faith.
In pestilence, we find contentment.
Nurgle's love is the most infectious of all.
May the garden of Nurgle be your paradise.
Rejoice in the beauty of putridity.
Let the blessings of the Plague Father be your strength.
May the suffering bring you enlightenment.
In decay, we find hope.
Nurgle's putrid embrace is the ultimate solace.
May the rot and filth be your renewal.
Revel in the refuge of Nurgle's garden.
Let the decay be your source of solace.

Nurgle's blessings are the cure for the soul.
